ygData.subject: Adiabatic, freely propagating 1-D flames
ygData.msgSnippet: I have successfully implemented the changes need in Cantera to model 1-D adiabatic flames, and thus predict laminar flame speeds.  It seems to work very well,

Subject: Adiabatic, freely propagating 1-D flames
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=184860759
X-Yahoo-Profile: kvirgilm



I have successfully implemented the changes need in Cantera to model 
1-D adiabatic flames, and thus predict laminar flame speeds.  It 
seems to work very well, having tested it for GRI 3.0 over a wide 
range of equivalence ratio.  

I think it would be nice if this capability was added to the CVS 
repository.  Let me know if you're interested.

Karl
